effects.effect: You have the following performance abilities, which are usable with your Routines feature.

features.name: Moonlight Sonata
features.flavor: Music pours out of your heart, filling the area with the utmost delicacy and without damper.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect:
While this performance is active, each target who is dead can choose to continue taking turns after death. On each of their turns, a target can move and use either a main action or a maneuver, but can't spend Recoveries or use triggered actions. At the end of the encounter, each target who chose to take turns this way turns to dust and blows away.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: While this performance is active, each target who starts their turn in the area ignores difficult terrain, and any ability they use that imposes forced movement gains a +2 bonus to the forced movement distance until the end of their turn. Additionally, once per combat round, each target can use a triggered action as a free triggered action.
